Krystal turned and saw June lying on the floor, the small blue dragon on top of her, enthusiastically licking her face and breasts. "What are you doing?" Krystal said to June, who answered, "He likes me, I think, and, ooh, that feels kinda good actually," she said as the small blue dragon's tongue darted over her breasts. June blushed as they firmed up, and the dragon moved its tongue down her belly, licking her pussy a bit before moving on to give her thighs a complete tongue massage.

Krystal was a little miffed, and said "Hey, are you going to help me find a way out of here or lie there and make out with your new friend?" she asked, keeping the fact she was envious June was getting all the attention to herself.

"In a moment, this feel so good," said June. The dragon licked her feet a bit before slurping first her right, and then left foot into its mouth. Its tongue continued its sensuous message as the dragon unhinged its jaws and began working its way back up her legs. Its throat bulged and its belly swelled as her knees and thighs disappeared into it.

"Um.. June.. the dragon's EATING you. Aren't you going to do, well, do something?" asked Krystal.

"Vermithrax told us only one of us would come out here. And.. oooh!" she moaned loudly as the dragon's tongue entered her pussy and began exploring inside of it. "You wouldn't believe how good this feels! If I'm going to go this is how I want it."

Krystal sat down, watching, as June thrashed about, as best she could for being half-inside her unlikely lover. The dragon slurped up her freely flowing juices as he brought her to climax again and again, keeping her in ecstasy for at least thirty minutes.

At last, June tired, lying down on the broken tiles, panting in exhaustion. The dragon resumed its slow advance, and her sex and belly slowly disappeared into the swelling dragon's belly. June stroked and petted the dragon's muzzle and eyeridges, and when the dragon reached her chest she helped push her breasts into its maw. "I hope I'm as good a meal for you as you were a lover for me," she said dreamily. She surrendered herself, laying back her head and closing her eyes. The dragon advanced again, taking in her head, and then quickly slurping down her arms. June gave a goodbye wave as the dragon finally finished her off and closed its mouth.

The dragon was so swollen he almost resembled a ball, its claws barely touching the ground. Krystal watched as his belly quickly settled down, and the dragon seemed to close its eyes and concentrate. She watched as the ball began to shrink noticeably, and as it did so the dragon grew. It only took about fifteen minutes, shorter than the time it took to consume its meal, for the bulge to be totally gone, and Krystal stood before a much larger dragon, who was now fifteen feet from snout to tail. It sat up, now eye level with Krystal.

"So, now what?" Krystal asked. The dragon nosed the door opposite the one the girls had entered through, and it silently slid open. The now much-larger blue dragon nosed Krystal towards the door.
1121211111212.title: June's Doom

11212111112121.content:
Krystal stepped through the doorway, a little uncertain of what would happen next. The blue dragon followed, and they found themselves in a large chamber that seemed to take up most of the building. Light spilled in through a large opening on the far wall, and like everything in this place it was in ruins. A medium-sized dragon skeleton, perhaps thirty feet from snout to tail, lay in the middle of the room, and a dimly glowing orb perhaps six inches across was visible inside its ribcage.

She turned to her new companion. "You mean we could have just walked around the building and come straight here?" The dragon seemed to nod, and then nosed her in the direction of the orb.

Krystal walked to the skeleton, and slid carefully between its ribs. She reached down, and took the orb. It began to glow brightly as she picked it up, and with a brilliant flash it quickly darted on its own to her sex and began to force its way inside her.

She screamed in pain as it penetrated her, and once inside her she felt its power radiating into her. She braced herself against one of the ribs to keep herself form collapsing, and she saw another flash, this time herself flashing, and then she felt oddly different as the pain subsided.

Looking at her hands as she released the skeletal rib, she noticed they were different. Green scales covered her hands, and her fingers were tipped with four-inch claws, and a few quick scratched on the ribs around her confirmed they were, in fact, razor sharp.

She could see the same scales seemed to cover her whole body, and her feet now only had four enormously clawed toes, arranged much like a bird of prey's. Krystal reached up with her new claws to check her face and found she now had a snout and a pair of stubby horns.

The blue dragon seemed somewhat bemused by all this, and after she had thoroughly checked herself out he said, "Hello, my new queen. My name is Tr'xel."

"Oh, you talk!" she said, somewhat surprised.

"I always could talk, but now you can understand the language of dragons," he answered, and continued, "Vermithrax sent me in here to make sure one of you made the transition smoothly. He was the chief adviser to the old queen, you know."

Krystal had a hundred questions, and just started firing them off. "What am I supposed to do now? Why did you eat June? Why do I look different now?"

"As the Queen of the Dragons, you can command all the dragons on the island. Actually, on the dragon side of the rift, it's more like a peninsula, and there are some ogres making trouble on the south side of the island, but that can be dealt with later."

"And I ate June first because I wanted you to be the Queen, and second because I wanted to be properly sized to you." He nosed her gently, and continued, "You see, us dragons can choose to grow or not to grow. There are advantages here to being very small - larger dragons tend not to mess with you. But you see, as the Queen, you are part dragon and part human. The orb inside you has balanced the draconic and human energies in you exactly, which is why you have the shape of a half-dragon."

"But, when you take a mate, the nature of that mate will shift the balance to one end or the other. Take a human mate, and you will become much how you were before, almost indistinguishable, in fact. Mate with a dragon though, and you will become like us."

Krystal listened, and thought about it a bit. "So, you want to be my mate? I suppose all men think the same!" she laughed.

"Well, wouldn't you like to be able to fly and breathe fire? Or live for a thousand years?" Tr'xel said. He twined his tail slowly around hers, and said, "What I did for June is nothing compared to what I can do for you."

"Well, there are the ogres, but I guess they can wait." Krystal giggled a bit as she lay down, still in the belly of the skeleton dragon, and pulled her new King on top of her.

... ... ... ...

Three weeks later, Krystal surveyed her territory from her new cliff top nest. It had taken her a little while to adjust to having wings and walking on all fours, but she felt she was doing quite well. Besides, she loved how her deep blue scales matched the sky and how they shimmered in the sun.

The ogres had been dealt with, and the dragons had eaten well. She missed her old friends but knew it couldn't have been any other way. Keira had hatched in her new form, a cute little black hatchling, and Amelia had become one with Vermithrax, who still acted as the Queen's chief adviser. June was gone, but it had been her choice.

Still lost in reflection, Krystal lay down, coiling her around her eggs. She closed her eyes and drifted off to sleep, hoping that perhaps some small piece of June's spirit would come to rest in one of them.
11212111112121.title: Krystal the Dragon Queen

choices: Vermithrax leads them to the temple
They follow Vermithrax all day but don't reach the temple yet
112121112.content:
Vermithrax waits until all the girls fall asleep before opening his eyes. He then looks down at the sleeping women and chuckles silently.

"Time for a midnight snack." Vermithrax whispers to himself evilly.

...

Amelia wakes up with a yawn and looks around the campsite. It's early morning and Kyrstal and Keira are still asleep and June is...

"Hey where's June?" Amelia asks aloud.

"Huh... What about June?" Kyrstal mumbles as she and Keira wake up.

"She's not here!" Amelia answers.

"She woke up early and left so she could get to the temple first and become the dragon queen." Vermithrax spoke startling the three girls.

"What?! That cheater! I hope something eats her!" Kyrstal yells in anger.

"Something doubtlessly did." Vermithrax explains, "I tried to warn her how dangerous the jungle is but she wouldn't listen."

"Good!" Amelia shouts, "Can lead us to the temple now?"

Vermithrax nods as he stands up, "Follow me."
112121112.title: June Vanishes

1121211121.content:
Vermithrax leads them to an old, crumbling stone building. As he leads the way in, nobody notices as a black-scaled claw reaches out, grabbing Amelia around the ankle. As Amelia is dragged into the hole, gagged by a tail, nobody notices. She enters the hole and a gulp is heard. Moments later, the hole explodes in dust, and a huge dragon-bigger than Vermithrax-clambers out of the hole, a woman-shaped bulge traveling slowly down his throat. He looks after the other girls and licks his lips. Vermithrax turns around with a shock and says "Gorilax! where have you been!?" The two dragons embrace, and Vermithrax notices Amelia, just entering Gorilax's throat. "Hey, that one was supposed to be mine!" The girls, hearing this, turn towards them uneasily. Gorilax says "There's still two left, brother. Dibs on the plump one!"


A minute later, two very full and very happy Black Dragons are sunning themselves outside their cave. Squirming in their stomachs and a stick, a sword and some clothes lying on the ground are all to testify that three would-be Dragon Queens had ever been there.


The spiritual dragon, watching them, sighed. "Well, I suppose the Dragons here know best. Those three were not strong enough to survive. So it shall continue, we living and devouring those not strong enough. Tis not such a bad life. It is a pity, though, that the one named Kiera was so easily fooled. I had high hopes for her, and had thought her smarter. And the one named Amelia.. well, she has dissapointed me as well."


Life on the island has continued til this day. Maybe some day, a dragon king or queen worthy will come to the island. Until then, onward.
1121211121.title: The end for the girls.

1121211122.content:
Vermithrax led the remaining girls off through the jungle. He supposed he should have waited, but, he hadn't had a girl in so long. Besides, he had to know more about them, and only by consuming one of them - body, mind, spirit, everything - could he truly learn about them. June had been quite enamored by him anyway, he hadn't even had to use any of his tricks to persuade her into voluntarily sublimating her own existence into his.

He stopped to eye the remaining girls. How delicious they looked!

"Is something wrong?" asked Krystal, who about bumped into the dragon when it suddenly stopped.

"Oh, no, nothing. I'm just thinking about which one of you is best suited to become queen," he said. Of course, he left out the part about how he was hoping that after he had absorbed their souls, he would be able to trick the ancient magics into granting him dominion over the island. They would find out in due time. Tonight, actually, if all went well.

By midmorning they had reached the cave he was leading them too. But he wanted them tired, so he veered around it so the girls wouldn't see, and led them on in great big circles through the jungle. The girls followed, mostly in silence, but occasionally chattering amongst themselves.

"I'm so tired! When are we going to get there?" Keira asked as the sun began to hang low in the sky.

"tomorrow, we're close. But we will rest here for tonight." Vermithrax pointed toward the cave, which they were coming 'round again. "You can rest in there. We'll be safe tonight."

With that, the girls made beds of leaves and twigs, and as the moon began to rise they settled down and went to sleep.

After a couple of hours, Vermithrax rose and went to the cave opening. He inhaled deeply, and gently exhaled a voluminous cloud of dense smoke into the chamber. The girls stirred, but did not wake as they inhaled his naturally drug-laden scent, and it lulled them into deep sleep with pleasant dreams.

Vermithrax took a deep breath to recharge, and exhaled again. And again. And again. Eventually the cave chamber was completely filled with his fog, and he sat back to contemplate which girl he wanted first.
1121211122.title: Maybe not a Dragon Queen?

11212111221.content:
Vermithrax reached into the cave with one his foreclaws and fished out Krystal. He gently cradled her in his claws, and placed her on the ground. Her athletic body was firm and lean, and looked absolutely delicious.

He gave her long lick, savoring her taste while he waited for her to rouse from her smoke-induced coma. He was starving and could take her flesh whenever he wanted but he needed her spirit as well. Vermithrax remembered when he was younger and not as large these human morsels were much more filling. Not to mention more common - the island had supported a population of some thousands of them. He supposed the dragon spirit was still annoyed with him for eating *all* of them and forcing the recruitment of Dragon Queens from off the island, but they had worshiped him as a living embodiment of the Dragon Spirit, and what greater honor could he bestow on his followers than allowing them to become one with him? Besides, after tonight he would finally be able to take the title of Dragon Queen, or King, is his case, for himself if all went well.

Krystal stirred, then opened her eyes. "Oh!" she exclaimed, still groggy from the effects of his smoke. She looked around, and asked, "What am I doing out here?"

"I just wanted to have a talk with you, away from the others. I have big plans for you, you know." Vermithrax answered. Krystal shivered in the cold air, and the dragon folded a wing over her, and exhaled a thin stream of his warm smoke over her. "Better?" he asked.

"Much! But, just what do you want to talk to me about? Especially in the middle of the night?" asked Krystal.

Vermithrax turned his head around on his long neck and rested it on the ground in front of Krystal, and gazed into her eyes. "I need to know more about you. Only one of you can become the Queen of the Dragons you know. There's no sense in putting all of you in danger if we can determine who is most likely to succeed in the first place and only send them in."

Krystal gazed back at the dragon. There was something vaguely mesmerizing about those giant orbs. She reached out with her hand and gently massaged his eye ridges as she said, "Well.. what do you want to know about?" she asked.

Vermithrax relaxed as she worked his eye ridges. He always loved it when they did that, it made him almost sorry she was going to be in his stomach soon. "I need to know everything Krystal, and to do that I need to use an ancient magic, one I mastered long ago." He flexed his neck slightly, and a bit more smoke began to stream from his nostrils.

Krystal inhaled its sweet scent, and felt herself slipping into a trance as she continued to gaze into the dragon's eyes. She felt she could lose herself in those bottomless crimson orbs. "What do I need to do?" she asked.

Vermithrax thought back to her, "When you feel my spirit around you, you need only surrender to it. We will become as one, and I will be able to learn all that I must learn. Now, lie down little one, and relax."

Krystal laid down on the ground in front of Vermithrax's muzzle. With a mental twist, he projected his own spirit around her and began to probe inside her mind, as he thought, "Now, do you give yourself to me, little one?"

A small voice in the back of Krystal's mind warned her this might not be such a good idea, but in her deep, relaxed trance she paid it no heed. "Yes, I surrender myself to you." she thought back to him.

Vermithrax smiled as he took his willing prey's mind into his own. She was so relaxed, so willing. He displaced her thoughts with his, and integrated her memories into his own. Mentally, he tugged on the remnants of her spirit, and they easily slid free of her body, glowing silvery-white in the night, with thin tendrils connecting both to Krystal's body and to the dragon.

With another mental twist, he effortlessly severed the connections to Krystal's body. The energy hung suspended in the air as Vermithrax sat up. He opened his mouth and made a biting motion at the spirit energy, inhaling sharply as he did so. Her soul entered him, and merged with his, and as it did so its human qualities vanished and it became entirely draconic.

Vermithrax broke his trance. Krystal's mind and spirit had been assimilated into his own. All that was left was to take her body as nourishment for his. He licked over the inert body, thoroughly enjoying the taste, and then opened his mouth wide and pulled it in with his tongue.

He closed his mouth, holding the girl's inert body body there. He hadn't had any humans, let alone such fine girls, in such a long time. He savored the taste for a few minutes, then tipped his head back and swallowed. He felt his throat bulge slightly as she went down, and felt pleasant after she landed in his stomach, although he was still plenty hungry.

He stood up and strode back to the cave mouth. Once there, he replenished the cloud of smoke within it before decided who he wanted to eat next.
11212111221.title: Krystal Consumed

112121112211.content:
Vermithrax was disappointed. Even when all four girls were in his stomach he'd still have to find some breakfast. He knew that was going to have to wait for quite a while though, as he still had to finish the task at hand.

He reached into the cave, trying to decide who he wanted next. "Hmm.. that treasure hunter girl did have an interesting tattoo on her..." he thought to himself as he carefully wrapped his talons around Amelia and pulled her out of the smoky cave.

Vermithrax set her upon the ground, and now that she was helpless he got a good look at it finally. A long, red, scaled neck came over her shoulder, its draconic head wreathing her breasts in tattooed fire. Its tail snaked around her belly and its tip curled around her navel. He nosed her on her side, and saw the rest of the dragon on her backside, wings spread wide in flight.

He smiled and thought to himself, "A dragon-worshiper!". Of course, they always called themselves fans or kindred spirits or some such, but he liked them all just the same, as they always gave themselves to him without him having to resort to any trickery. They were usually quite awed by the whole experience.

But, that would have to wait a while. He could tell he'd given the last two a bit too much smoke, as she was deeply under its spell and wouldn't rouse for a while. He folded a wing over her to shield her from the wind and resigned himself to having to wait.

...

Four hours later, as dawn was just beginning to break over the island, Amelia finally stirred, and then opened her eyes.

"Ah, I see you are finally awake!" he thought to her. She sat up, and looked around, saying "Where am I? Where the others?"

"Keira is inside the cave. I ate June and Krystal already," he thought back to her. He laid his head down on the ground and fixed his hypnotic gaze on her.

"Huh?" she said. She was surprised, and wondered why she wasn't scared out of her mind. She felt only a vague kind of relaxation.

Vermithrax seemed to pick up on this. "Don't be alarmed Amelia. You're still under the effects of my breath. It has a very intoxicating effect on non-dragons." He breathed over her a bit to prove his point, and she felt a mild euphoric feeling come over her as she breathed it in. It tasted very good, and she felt herself craving more of it.

"Are you going to eat me too?" she asked him.

He nodded. "Before we are done, you will beg me to eat you," he thought back to her, and continued, "You see, all of you have the power in you to become the ruler of this island. But only one of you actually can do so. The others will become food, if not for the many creatures that live here, for the new Queen herself. It has always been that way."

He placed his nostrils against her belly and blew more warm smoke over her, before beginning to work her breasts with his tongue. He got a good taste of her, and she felt herself actually start to get turned on by the attention.

She giggled slightly. "And you don't think I have what it takes so you're just going to eat me know?" she asked, pushing her breasts up against his tongue. If she was going to go she may as well at least enjoy it a bit.

"Actually, I have my own ideas. You see, little one, long ago I learned how to consume not just the flesh, but the very souls of lesser beings than I. When I do this I gain all their knowledge, thoughts, feelings, their very essence. Including any magical abilities or powers they may have. But... the creature must give herself to me willingly." His eyes began to shimmer slightly, whirring through slightly different shades of crimson.

He withdrew his tongue from her breasts and opened his mouth. Amelia stood up and leaned over his muzzle, getting a good lungful of the smoke streaming from his nostrils. "So, you want our spirits so you can become the ruler of the island yourself, huh?" She laughed, and then climbed into his mouth and lay down on his warm, wet tongue, knowing she was safe until she desired to be swallowed and consumed. "Why are you telling me all this? Did the others consent so easily?"

Vermithrax closed his mouth around Amelia, and wrapped her in his tongue. He sat up and thought back to her. "I did not tell them the truth as I have told you. You bear the mark of a dragon-worshiper. There is no need to deceive you, you will not refuse."

Amelia caught her breath as she started to get more than just a little turned on. "You mean this tattoo? I was so into dragons when I was a teenager. I used to have this dream.. that was a big dragon queen and slept on a huge pile of treasure every night. I always did like treasure, that's why I got this tattoo and became a professional treasure-hunter, and.. ooh!"

She moaned in pleasure as the tip of Vermithrax's tongue wound it's way around her leg and sensuously began to probe inside her.

"I can grant your wish," he thought to her and he expertly began to thrust his tongue inside her, enjoying the taste of her juices as they began to roll on his tongue. He tilted his head back and let them roll down his throat, thoroughly enjoying the taste. "After I have consumed you, your consciousness will become one with mine. You will be a dragon, in the most literal sense."

Inside his mouth, she surrendered herself to the lust the dragon was so expertly inciting within her. She felt so good inside of him, like she had always belonged there. Maybe she had. She began to thrust her hips against the probing tongue, and grabbed hold of it, driving it deep inside of her. She was amazed it could feel so good, like very gentle sandpaper.

Vermithrax only smiled as he pleasured her, massaging her entire body with his tongue, still coiled about and inside her. He felt her buck and heard her moan inside of him. As she approached her climax he grinned evilly and withdrew his tongue.

"Do you wish to be consumed, my little dragon-worshiper?"

Amelia, suddenly deprived of her passion felt an irresistibly powerful craving for him. She desired to taste his smoke, she desired to feel him inside her, she desired to feel her inside of him. "Yes," she said. "Take me, please!" she begged him, as she realized that only he could fulfill her deepest fantasies.

Vermithrax inhaled sharply, and began to exhale a dense, smoky cloud through his mouth. He cut it off sharply as he closed around her again, twin streams of dense smoke streaming from his nostrils. He thrust the tip of his tongue deeply inside her, squeezing her as he did so with the coils around her.

She drove her hips forward, wanting to feel all of that huge tongue in her, and screamed in delight as she reached her climax, her juices flowing freely into his mouth. She felt very draconic herself as her lungs filled with the dragon's breath and she expelled it in turn, and kept driving herself upon him until she was thoroughly spent.

She felt oddly peaceful as she relaxed, still inside the dragon's coiled tongue, and it still inside her. She felt the dragon's presence around her, and Vermithrax said, "It is time."

She surrendered herself, and quickly felt herself being pulled free of her body. The dragon's spirit felt warm and pleasant as it took her very being into himself, and she began to be aware of the dragon's body, her new body.

"Yes," thought Vermithrax. "Now, feel your old self as I feel you."

She felt her body inside her new mouth, and was surprised that anything could taste so good. She was so hungry too, and had to fight to keep from swallowing this little morsel, nicely stewed in its own juices.

"Go ahead, take it." the dragon thought to her. Needing no more prompting, she uncoiled her tongue and worked the body to the back of her new mouth, and swallowed it down hungrily. It made a slight, but pleasant bulge in her throat and felt quite good in her stomach.

With that, she felt the dragon's mind come inside her own. "Now, become one with me. Become me." he said hypnotically, and she found herself saying it along with him. His thoughts became her thoughts, and her thoughts became memories of a person she once was, one of countless thousands who had made the same choice as she.

Vermithrax felt the familiar rush as her spirit joined with his, and once again broke his trance. By now it was well into morning, but he knew Keira would remain under his spell until he pulled her out of his intoxicating cloud.
112121112211.title: Amelia's Surrender

choices: He goes directly to the temple.
1121211122111.content:
It was midmorning when Keira finally stirred within the cave. Vermithrax was glad she was finally awake - he was going to have to make this one a quickie, he hadn't eaten a real meal in a couple of days and he was starving. A big dragon like him needed a lot of food, after all.

She got to her feet and looked around for a moment, then looked up at Vermithrax who was lying down outside and said, "Where are the others?"

"You slept rather late. They went ahead of you already."

"WHAT?! Has one of them become the dragon queen already?" she said indigently. How dare they go off ahead and leave her behind? It wasn't fair!

"No. Actually they were all eaten." he thought back to her. "That's why I'm still here. You are the only human who can become the Dragon Queen now."

"Oh." she said, kind of sad all her friends had become food but a little relieved she still had a shot at the big prize. "So, when do get going?" she asked him.

"Right now," he thought to her. "But, there is something we must do first. Look into my eyes," he commanded her.

Keira did as she was told, and as she gazed into his huge, crimson orbs she suddenly felt oddly relaxed and a little dizzy. "What are you doing?" she whispered to him.

He mentally beckoned her. She walked to his head, still resting on the ground, and began to massage his eyeridges and snout gently. He let out a soft myrrh, and exhaled a light stream of smoke over her.

"An ancient magic. There are many dangers on this island, little one. I can make our minds as one. You will know all I know, and I all you know, and you will know what must be done to become the Dragon Queen. All you have to do is surrender yourself to me."

"Oh," said Keira. "Sure, do whatever." She was rather enjoying the experience, actually.

Vermithrax smiled as he extended his own mind into her. She jumped slightly when she felt his mind inside her. She felt mildly curious as to what was happening as he displaced her thoughts with his. Soon she too felt very hungry and slightly impatient, and shortly after that her mind was indistinguishable from the dragon's.

The dragon sat up, and leaned his long neck over, taking Keira's inert body into his mouth. He leaned his head back, gravity sliding her over his tongue to the back of his throat, where he swallowed, and as her body began to be processed into nourishment for him, he absorbed her very essence, her soul merging with his like a drop of water splashing into a vast ocean.

He snapped from his trance. The girls were gone but their essence, and the magic to become the ruler of the dragons along with it, was now his.
1121211122111.title: Keira's Big Gulp

choices: Vermithrax loses!  He was an evil dragon anyway!
11212111221111.content:
Vermithrax turned away from the cave and took to wing. He was still starving but he was sure he could scrounge something up at the temple. He'd been guarding the place for centuries, after all.

He flew toward the large mountain at the center of the island, and, once he caught sight of the huge but dilapidated marble structure, he slowly spiraled down and landed with a soft 'thwump' on the roof.

From the roof, there wasn't much to see, but he knew where the orb lay within the building, so he padded over to where he figured he was just above it, then lifted his massive tail in the air, and brought its spike down hard on the stone.

It struck home with a thunderous crash, and cracks appeared in the roof. He lifted his tail and smashed it down again, and again, and again. Finally, he heard the roof begin to crack and snap, and then, it suddenly gave way underneath him.

He scrambled for a foothold, not wanting to risk damaging his wings amidst all the debris, but it was no use. He landed with a great splash in a deep pool of water, which, even when he was standing, came up almost to his head.

Vermithrax looked around. He'd never actually been in the temple before. It seemed to be all one room, and he was in a circular pool of some sort. On an island in the center stood a small statue of a dragon, the orb of the Dragon Queen held in its maw.

He stopped to behold the orb, the object of his quest. Normally only a human girl with the magic to become the Queen could take it, but he was sure that with the magic he knew he could draw out the magic the girls had had from within him and take it for himself.

Slowly he began to wade toward the orb. The bottom of the pool seemed to covered in a good deal of muck and moving was difficult.

Suddenly, he felt something brush against his leg, and before he could react an enormous serpentine head, easily four feet across, rose from the water and darted toward him. Slowed by the water he could only roar and bite at the head as it, being in its own element, darted easily around his maw and latched onto his neck.

He felt its powerful coils begin to snake around him. Vermithrax was mildly annoyed, usually he could easily dispatch such a beast but there was the small matter of being stuck in the mud. He wasn't worried though, as a plan was already beginning to form inside his scaled head.
11212111221111.title: Perhaps a Dragon King?

choices: Vermithrax is banished to limbo forever.
112121112211111.content:
The serpent continued to coil around Vermithrax, and began to squeeze with bone-crushing force. Vermithrax grunted slightly, he massive, ancient bulk could withstand such force but not for long.

He chuckled to himself as the serpent threw coil after coil around his body. He had the skills of a hundred wizards, after all, and one of them had been quite adept with electricity. He waited, tolerating the ever-tightening squeeze, until the serpent had him completely encoiled. With a mental twist, he sent a mighty electric discharge over his scales and into the water.

The serpent convulsed, and, mere seconds later, it was over. The serpent loosened its coils around him and began to float unconscious in the water.

Vermithrax freed himself from the serpent, thinking to himself, "Finally, some food!". He could barely contain himself as he grasped the serpent's head in his own jaws and began to greedily wolf it down. His throat enlarged as he took it in, and as sixty feet and thousands of pounds of giant serpent disappeared down the dragon's gullet his belly began to expand in the water.

Ten minutes later he finished his meal and resumed moving toward the orb. His belly drug along the muck, reminding him he wouldn't be able to fly until he slept off his meal, but he didn't mind, as he wouldn't have to eat again for at least a week.

Finally he pulled himself up out of the water and stood before the orb. The dragon statue it was encased in was much smaller than he, sized for the human girls that had always pulled the orb from its maw and claimed it for themselves.

With a mental twist he summoned the energies that had belonged to the girls from within him and projected them around the orb. It began to glow brightly, varied colors whirling within it.

Just as he was preparing to take the orb for himself, the Dragon Spirit suddenly appeared before him.

"Stop, ancient one! You can not do this, it is an abberation of nature!" she commanded him.

Vermithrax chuckled. "What would you have me do then, goddess?" he asked her in the language of dragons. "This place has been severed from both our world and that of humans, and the girls are all gone. If I don't do this, we will float in limbo forever."

The Dragon Spirit shimmered in the gloom, spirit energy rising from her like wisps of smoke. "Perhaps it is better that way. All you live for anymore is to consume. You consumed the humans that used to live here. You consumed the entire nation that used to border this place. You consumed all who came to consort with you from our world. You consumed the girls who should rule you."

Vermithrax regarded her and said, "I am a dragon. The oldest dragon. The greatest of all living creatures. Why would anything not want to be consumed by me?" he asked, genuinally puzzled. "There are billions of unhappy humans in the world the girls came from. Once the rift is open once more, I will give them happiness. I will allow them to become one with the greatest creature in existence!"

The dragon spirit knew it was hopeless, and that she had to stop this deranged dragon from eating the human race to extinction. But she had a plan.

"I can not stop you," she said to him. "Take my spirit. With it, you can become a true dragon god. Perhaps then you will see the folly of your plan."

Vermithrax looked at the Dragon Spirit. He knew it was a trick, but he also knew if he could trick the trickster, he really would become a god. He was supremely confident in himself though. After all, with the experiences of countless thousands within him, he had seen every trick there was, and even some that weren't.
112121112211111.title: Vermithrax vs. the Dragon Spirit

1121211122111111.content:
Vermithrax regarded the Dragon Spirit. 'Foolish goddess' he thought. Foolish, but still immensely powerful, her spirit was far more powerful than his, even though it was greatly augmented.

He regarded the Dragon Spirit, still hovering there, waiting for him. Mentally, he reached out, and then with all his power invaded her mind. He felt her defenses lash out against his own mind, ready to engage in a battle of wills he could not possibly win. So he didn't fight it, instead he ducked under her consciousness and with a swift mental twist removed her desire to fight him at all.

Suddenly robbed of her motivation, she thought, "Oh, this isn't fair!" Vermithrax only chuckled and said, "But it is, foolish goddess. Now join with me, become one with me, I will show you what it means to truly be a god!"

With that, he opened his mouth and mentally pulled on his newest conquest. Being a purely spirit being, she began to move toward him, and and as she did so she began to lose her shape and stream into his waiting mouth.

Vermithrax caught his breath as he assimilated her. Such power! It was almost corporeal, and as her essence streamed into him he found himself literally drinking it. He continued to pull, suppressing her thoughts as he did so, and replacing them with his own. Soon nothing remained of the Dragon Spirit.

Vermithrax stood there for a while, acclimating to the new power within him. He had been powerful before but only an insect compared to what he was now. His crimson eyes became little flames, and with each breath he exhaled a dense cloud of smoke. His scales become dark, impossibly dark, seeming to suck the very light from the space around him.

The new god turned toward the dragon statue, and gently took the orb in a foreclaw. He raised it to his mouth, and bit down hard on it. The orb shattered, and released its energy in one explosive burst. Vermithrax merely swallowed, not even having to bother with finesse anymore.

With yet another mental twist he re-established the rift between worlds, and then took to wing, bursting through the ceiling of the temple. As he flew into the world of the humans, the first dragon in 500 years to do so, he felt the energy inside of him pushing outward. He felt uncomfortable, and began to grow larger to relieve the stress, finally stopping once he reached about two hundred feet in length.

Soon he found himself flying high above a beach in a land called California. The wretched creatures didn't see him, and he felt sorry for them. They were so puny and weak and.. well.. small. But Vermithrax would fix that.

He pulled his wings in and went into a steep dive. The people on the beach looked up. Some ignored him, some did a double-take, not believe what they were seeing. None tried to run though as the dragon exhaled a huge blast of fire over them, incinerating their bodies instantly. As their frail bodies died Vermithrax pulled their spirits into himself, no longer needing their permission to absorb them. In a few minutes the beach was clear.

He flew inland, and found himself over a vast city. By now people had become aware of him and were hiding, but he could feel their spirits. He pulled with all his newfound might, and countless millions of human souls began to flow into him. He could hardly believe what was happening himself as he consumed their spirits, leaving their bodies, far too many to handle or even count.

As he took more and more humans, he continued to grow. Soon he was the size of a skyscraper, and as he moved north, leaving a swath of dead, soulless husks behind him, he grew and grew until he was the size of a mountain, and then a city, his wings covering the sky from horizon to horizon.

Within a few hours he had devoured the souls of the entire nation and grown so large that his body stuck outside the atmosphere when he sat up, and the smoke from his breath was beginning to encircle the entire world. He lay down, his massive, three-hundred mile long body crushing countless former communities as he did so, and rested.

...

Several hours later he woke, and knew what he had to do. He took wing, flying high above the Earth, where there was no air to fly through, going purely on the power of his vast spirit and looked down. It would be a tough fit, but he was sure he could do it.

Slowly he opened his mouth and unhinged his jaw, and slowly began to work his jaws around the entire Earth. He willed himself to grow as he did so, and slowly mountains, cities, countries, oceans, the entire world began to pass through his jaws. Vermithrax sucked the life force out of everything as he did so. Grass turned brown, animals and plants died, and people stopped lifeless even as they beheld his colossal teeth. He absorbed them all, happy to be able to grant them eternal life as a part of the greatest, largest dragon who had ever lived.

Some hours later his jaws finally closed again, and he swallowed, his massive throat sending the entire world to his stomach, where it was swiftly digested, processed into pure energy for a cosmic dragon. Vermithrax looked around at the universe he was in, and saw countless stars, and surely some of them had worlds, worlds that he would consume until all of existence had become one with him.

He looked at a nearby star. Nearby was a relative term of course, it would still take many years to reach it. But it seemed like a good place to start. With that, Vermithrax beat his wings against nothing, and started flying through the void to his next meal.
1121211122111111.title: Apocalypse

1121211122111112.content:
Vermithrax reached towards the dragon spirit so that he could absorb her into to him. The dragon spirit quickly dodged him before summoning a large ball of mystical energy and flinging it at him. Vermithrax tried to scramble out of the way but the giant snake he had just eaten slowed him down. The ball of energy impacts against him forming a dimensional rift.

"Curses!" Vermithrax yells as he is pulled through the rift. The rift then collapses on itself and disappears.

...

"Where am I?" Vermithrax asks himself as he looks at his surroundings. It looks like he's on the beach of another tropical island like Dragon Island.

"Eh, Mon!" Someone shouts.

"Huh?" Vermithrax replies as he looks down and sees a man with long dreadlocks looking up at him, "Yes?"

"Come limbo with us mon." The strange man answers as he points over his shoulder.

Vermithrax looks at where he pointed and sees a bunch of people having a party and doing the limbo.

"Um, no thank you I'm a little busy... what the!?" Vermithrax shouts in surprise as his large body starts to move on its own towards the bamboo limbo bar, "What's going on?! I can't control my body!"

"This is the limbo dimension mon. Everyone does the limbo for eternity here." The man with the dreadlocks replies.

"Nooooooo!!!!!" Vermithrax wails as his body starts to bend over backwards to go under the bar.
1121211122111112.title: Vermithrax Is Banished To Limbo... Literally

112121112212.content: Vermithrax chose Amelia and carefully pulled her out. When she arose he said, "Good morning Amelia..." he spoke as he pinned her down with his fore claws. Amelia replied "What are you doing?" Still sleepy from Vermithrax's drug. Vermithrax said "I will devour you." Amelia said "Wha... Why?" Vermithrax only spoke "I devoured Krystal and June... Its your turn.." Right before Vermithrax got her into his jaws, someone kicked Vermithrax's talons and rescued Amelia. Vermithrax only cursed as he tried to claw this mystery person. "Your not getting another meal. I assure you that." Surprised Vermithrax said "What makes you so sure and speak your name." The mystery person said "Humph. If you must know, its Eroek." "Lucky me! I get to eat five humans!" Eroek only laughed "In your dreams Vermithrax!" Vermithrax was shocked that he knew his name. "How do you know my name human." Eroek replied as he swung his sword "I heard it around the island. I can tell you nothing more." Eroek then quickly dashed into the cave and took Keira out. Vermithrax only roared and swooped his paw down on Eroek, by a hair thread Vermithrax missed. "Damn. I gotta get out quickly." He called his dragon and waited. "Bah! Your pathetic attempts to yell will be in vain!" Just then and there, a dragon came and Eroek, with Amelia and Keira on his back, jumped on the dragon. He yelled "No, you will die." Then an arrow speared across the sky and hit Vermithrax in the head. Vermithrax roared and fell, but he wasn't dead. It stopped only because he had a thick skull.
112121112212.title: Saved!

1121211122121.content:
After a few hours, Amelia awoke. She saw Krystal awake also. She felt something hard against her. She turned and saw another dragon. She retreated back and she started to remember what happened. This person... Eroek.

---Meanwhile..--

Vermithrax yelled "Curse that Eroek human. I was so close getting the dominion over this island. So close!" Eroek said "Humph. You would have never gained dominion over this island anyway! You are too wicked!" Vermithrax said "Come out of the shadows! Now human!" Eroek emerged from the shadows and stood his ground. Vermithrax then said "I finally got you!" His claws came out and grabbed Eroek. Eroek unsheathed his sword and sliced at the forearm. "Like I said, you will never gain dominion over this island." said Eroek as Vermithrax dropped him. Vermithrax howled in pain. "We will meet again Vermithrax..." said Eroek. "You won't gain dominion over this island. Ever."
1121211122121.title: Hurt Vermithrax

11212112.content:
Amelia and her little blue friend followed the passage through the rock. It twisted and turned and rose and fell, and after an hour of walking Amelia finally sat down and said, "We're going the wrong way, aren't we?" The little blue dragon seemed to shrug, and sat to rest himself.

After a brief rest they resumed their journey through the dimly lit cavern. Eventually they saw a glow up ahead. "Finally, the way out!" Amelia exclaimed as they hastened their pace. Turning the corner, they could see daylight on the far side of a large cave. In their way, however, was another red dragon. This one was a bit smaller than the dragon from earlier but was still a good twenty feet from snout to tail. Its scales glittered in the sunlight and it rested on a nest of all sort of glittering shiny objects mixed with bones and mud.

The red dragon saw them, and crouched down low. The small blue dragon saw this and bolted for the exit, and Amelia followed as fast as she could, tearing her leg on a jagged rock as she tore across the cave. Despite the pain and freely flowing blood she did not cry out, hoping the dragon wouldn't go for her.

The dragon pounced, and...
11212112.title: Lost and Found

112121121.content: The dragon missed Amelia only by an inch. It bashed onto the ground causing a minor quack. Amelia ran as fast as she could until she reached the mouth of the cave. There the little blue dragon was waiting, motioning her to hurry. Suddenly they heard a moaning voice from behind. It was the red dragon. It stumbled to its feet and now looked at Amelia and the blue dragon with a sad emotion on its face. Amelia felt sorry for it. She wasn't sure anymore, should she follow the blue dragon or go back to the red dragon.
112121121.title: missed!

1121211211.content:
Amelia decided to follow the blue dragon. He had saved her from the red dragon earlier and Amelia trusted him. She ran after the blue dragon, ignoring the moans of the red dragon.

The sun was down and it was very dark. The moon was blocked by the mountain and it was nearly impossible to see the blue dragon. He himself realized this a came to a halt. Then he motioned Amelia to settle down in a small whole in the ground. It then lay on top of Amelia. "What are you trying to do!?" Amelia struggled under its weight. The blue dragon looked at her as if to say,' I can of course come off and let you freeze to death."
Amelia stopped struggling and tried to grab some sleep.

The next morning she woke up to be cold. The blue dragon had disappeared. Amelia started to panic, she looked out of the hole she was in. It was large field full of flowers. The most beautiful flowers she had ever seen. No treasure she had found beat the beauty of them. As she starred at them a blue figure suddenly appeared from the flowers. The blue dragon came along with and spat a bunch of berries in front of Amelia. "Eat,' he growled to her. "What! These things have been inside you, are you kidding me!,' she shouted. The blue dragon looked insulted. Amelia felt bad. "I'm sorry, I'm just not used to this"

Some of the berries were familiar, such as strawberries and blue berries. Some; however, were completely new to Amelia. She ate them anyhow becuase she trusted the blue dragon. They continued through the sea of flowers. Suddenly the blue dragon pounced on Amelia and kept her pinned to the ground. Amelia realized that the blue dragon was trying to defend her for infront of them was a violet dragon. It was four times the size of Amelia. How could the blue dragon stand a chance against such a thing. The scarlet dragon started walking away from the. The blue dragon let go of Amelia, asuming the scarlet dragon only came in intrest to see what they were and helped her up. "Thanks, you saved me again,' Amelia said and hugged the blue dragon. It blushed a little, but then the scarlet dragon's tail suddenly, grabbed Amelia around her legs, pulled her towards it, through her in the air and she started falling right towards its waiting maw.
1121211211.title: Trust in a dragon

11212112111.content: She slammed her eyes shut as she landed face first onto an extended, forked tongue. She rolled off the side of the tongue landing on something... warm and sticky? She tentatively opened one eye and saw that the dragon had at least two tongues. They wrap around her, constricting her.  Amelia feels ready to explode when...
11212112111.title: Tasting Amelia with many tongues...

11212112112.content:
Amelia was ready to become a meal. She closed her eyes, thinking there was no hope for her. She was wrong. Amelia was expecting a wet landing, but instead hit the ground. She dared to look up and what she saw was the impossible of impossible. The blue dragon had sunk its teeth into the violet dragon's tail and was now swinging it around and around. Then it smashed it from side to side on the ground. The swinging started again and Amelia saw as the violet dragon flew some distance from them, landing hard.

Amelia starred, mouth open at the blue dragon. He; in the other hand, came up to Amelia, grabbed her with his jaw and threw her on his back. He continued transporting her for the next two hours not letting go of her arms. Amelia had no choice, but to let him do it his way.

They reached the end of the flower sea and came to a rocky landscape. "Rocks, rocks, rocks,' Amelia complained,' don't tell me this is our path." The blue dragon motioned her to look more carefully. Amelia did as told and realized that he rocks were swarming with riches. Diamonds, emeralds, rubies and other rocks completely knew to her. She of course thought she had died and come to heaven. Amelia advanced towards the nearest treasures, but the blue dragon snatched her arm and stopped her. Amelia was about to ask what's wrong with you when the dragon spirit popped in front of her and scared her to death. "You are very fortunate, young lady. This friend of yours is a very special and rare type of dragon. As you saw earlier, he defeated a dragon with more power than ten of his kind. Though they are weak and small, they become very dangerous if they see someone they love in danger." Amelia looked down at the blue dragon who quickly blushed. "Now, this place in front of you,' the dragon spirit continued,' is one of the most dangerous places on this island. It easily attracts the weak hearted who then never come back." Amelia protested,' I'm not weak hearted!" The dragon spirit said," Oh, aren't you. The treasure hunter who sacrificed her best friend in-able to raid the tomb of Ramses the II. The greedy one who left her brother to suffer in the heart of a volcano to reach the worlds largest oil foundation. The infamous girl who stole her partners oxygen bottle in the underwater cave when she wanted all the honor of exploring the cave herself. You are a selfish, greedy creature with no respect for others around you. Don't you call this weak hearted?" Amelia sobbed,' how do you know all this?" "I think I know those who enter my domain,' the dragon spirit said,' and one more thing. Don't trust anyone in there except your friend."

The dragon spirit disappeared and Amelia looked at the blue dragon who was entering the rocky region. Amelia wasn't quite sure she wanted to go.
11212112112.title: Small But Powerful

1121211212.content: Amelia couldn't help it. She felt so bad for the red dragon. As she approached it, she thought,' what an idiot I am. It probably just wants to eat me. As she got close the red dragon looked happy and lay on the ground, separating its front arms. Amelia realized that it wanted to hug her. Amelia walked between its arms and it closed them, pressing Amelia against its chest. Then it grabbed Amelia between its claws and placed in the nest. It climbed in the nest after that, lay down and wrapped its tale around Amelia. It moved her right under its belly and let go. Amelia realized she could run away when it fell asleep, but then she felt the warmth of the dragon which was very comforting. The gurgles from the belly were like a luluby and she started drifting to sleep. She had to make the choise now, run or stay.
1121211212.title: Dragon's pet

11212112121.content:
"I guess It wouldn't hurt to stay for a while..." Amelia mumbled to herself as she drifted off into slumber

She woke up to the same gurgling she had heard the night before. This time it seemed strangely inviting and she stayed cuddled with the dragon for a good many hours. Eventually the dragon woke up though.

"Good morning" Amelia heard inside her head. "I trust you had a good rest?"
"Yes, I did. But anyway, why did you take me like that? I thought you wanted to eat me and the rumbling of your belly sort of supported it."
"I did at first." Was the reluctant reply. "But I realized that I could not eat someone that came back to help someone like me after I attacked you like that."
"Well, thank you for not eating me I guess. You do seem hungry though, could I get you something to eat?"
"Yes, actually, I would like to eat something. Do you have any meat on you?"

"No actually, but I could"...
11212112121.title: Stay

112121121212.content:
let you eat me." She slowly finishes her sentence.
"But why? Why would you allow me to do that?" said the astonished dragon.
"I couldn't really do anything on this island, by now the others are way ahead of me on becoming the Queen anyway and I'll just get eaten by something else on this island. Besides, you could have eaten me anyway and that belly is very seducing, I guess I'm yours."
"Very well." Was the reply "If that is your wish. Also, if you need to know, my name is Brenmanika." He held his mouth open, like an inviting gateway.

Amelia crawled in his maw and chuckled "I guess this is your lucky day Brenmanika."
"Yes... Very lucky indeed..." His voice ominously trailed off and he closed his mouth and swallowed.

She gently slided down the throat into the stomach of the red dragon. "Why did I just do that?" she mumbled to herself as she trailed off into slumber...

She woke up hours later in a curled position. "What?" she wondered with surprise. "I'm still alive?"
"Yes" said Brenmanika. His back was turned away from Amelia and he was gazing at the temple of the Dragon Queen in the distance. "Your sacrifice showed that you had the courage to accept the inevitable things of the world and that you were willing to do even the smallest amount with your life if nothing else was possible. As such, you have passed one of the three trials of this land. and are free to go to the temple." He turned to Amelia. "But be warned, you still have two trials to pass. The next one is a trial of companionship and well.." His face blushed even stronger than his already red color. "I would wish to be your mate."

"Yes." Was her soft reply. "You are the only dragon that has shown me kindness on this island my taking me in, if even but a short moment."

"Very well then" He stood up proudly. "We will need to venture to the temple of the Dragon Spirit to complete your ascension. Try to test out your new body on the flight there."

"What new.." she cut herself off mid-sentence as she realized she had dragon wings on her back and scales all over her. She was the same color as Brenmanika and her scales resembles his.

"Let's fly!" Brenmanika roared as he lept off of the cliff ledge.
112121121212.title: Ancient Trails

choices: Amelia makes a run for it.
112121122.content:
Amelia screamed as she saw the dragon's teeth come down in front of her, and kicked violently as she was raised high into the air, her rear and legs dangling outside the red dragon's mouth. She struggled in vain as the dragon swallowed, forcing her head into its throat. Another swallow took her in up to her hips. She tried to free herself but the fit inside the dragon's throat was very tight and she could barely move. Despite the uncomfortable-looking bulge in its throat the dragon seemed to be enjoying itself, and it lazily swallowed again, taking her in all the way to her shapely calves. Another swallow and Amelia was on her way to the dragon's stomach. She struggled in panic as she felt the stomach acids begin to eat away her skin and flesh, but it was no use and she quickly passed out.

...

Sometime later she was rather surprised to wake again. The first thing she noticed was the pain in her leg was gone, and the second was that she was inside something, something very small. She pushed and found that whatever it was was cracking, so she struck out again, and the wall containing her collapsed, spilling her out onto the floor of the nest.

The somewhat bemused dragon watched her emerge from her egg, and said, "Good morning, pet."

"Um.. what happened?" asked Amelia, somewhat confused.

The dragon answered, "I ate you. I took your body as nourishment, made this new body for you from the mountain using my dragon-magic, and put your spirit back into it. You belong to me now."

"... belong to you?" asked Amelia, still confused.

"Yes, your new body is only temporary. If it goes a day without my magic, it will die. So don't think about leaving, you are mine now. My pet and servant. Oh, and you call me Amy."

"Amy... what an odd name for a dragon," said Amelia, who continued, "Well, Amy, what would you have me do?"

"Clean my nest!" the dragon said. "I'm going out, have it done before I get back." With that, the dragon took wing and flew out of the cave, leaving Amelia alone.
112121122.title: Amelia the Dragon's Pet

choices: "Today we are going to the coronation of a new Dragon Queen"
"Because you are going to accompany me out on the island"
1121211221.content:
Amelia decided it was better safe than sorry and set about her task, sweeping out the bones and bits of muck that seemed to encrust everything onto the mountainside outside the lair. She was a little grossed out when she realized the muck was dried dragon excrement, and a bit creeped out when she saw her own skull peeking out a fresh mound, but she cleaned it all just the same. She had been working the better part of ten hours and was just finishing up when she heard wing beats. She looked up and saw Amy returning, just in time to dive out of the way.

"Ah, it looks excellent!" said Amy, obviously impressed.

"Well, I've been working all day." said Amelia. "Can I get something to eat?" she asked, famished from her exertions.

The dragon chuckled. "You don't need to eat any more, pet. My magic will take care of that."

Amy walked up to Amelia, and said "Now try and relax. Most of my pets come to enjoy the experience after a time." Amy opened her mouth wide and once again snatched Amelia up in her jaws. This time, Amelia did not resist and found the dragon's mouth and throat to be strangely comfortable, as if they were welcoming her, keeping her warm and snug as Amy once again swallowed her down. Amy's throat was smooth, and the stomach juices merely tingled. She relaxed in Amy's stomach, and once again lost consciousness.

The next morning she once again broke out of an eggshell, and saw Amy resting in the nest. She collected her thoughts, and said, "Amy, are you going to eat me every day?"

"Yes. Your body will only last a day. If I don't eat you, you will die. But, if I were you, I'd see this as a great blessing."

"Why?"

"As long as you are my pet, you can not be killed, or injured, or become ill. Every day you get a brand new body. But today I'm rather hungry, which means it will be a short day for you."

Amy wolfed down Amelia once again. Amelia was starting to get used to this process, and found that by carefully pushing herself in she could actually get herself down in one swallow. And it did feel kind of good. Perhaps she would learn to like it after all.

She fell asleep there in the dragon's stomach, and woke in her egg. After she had freed herself, she looked around, and saw Amy sitting near the entrance to nest, looking out.

"Today is a special day, pet." Amy said.
1121211221.title: Dragon Food

choices: They make their way to the new Queen.
11212112211.content:
"There's a new Dragon Queen. We're going to meet her," said Amy. She lowered a wing to the ground and said, "Now jump up on my back, and try to hold on."

Amelia climbed up, a little disappointed that she wasn't the one. At least she was still alive, she still had no idea what had happened to the others, although she supposed she would find out soon enough.

Amy took wing and they flew out of the nest and over the mountainside. She could see from up here that the island really seemed to be the end of a long peninsula that snaked away into the distance. Amy banked and flew some miles over dense forests, which eventually thinned and gave way to rolling hills.

After a couple of hours of flight Amy finally descended into a lazy glide, and landed in a large, grassy field filled with all manner of dragons. Amelia saw dragons large and small of all colors, and even a dragon that seemed to be made entirely of fire and a huge black dragon, easily the largest that was there.

Amy landed and Amelia hopped off her back. "Now stay close, pet. Every dragon here will know you're mine, but some of them might try to make a snack out of you anyway. And I don't think you'd like it nearly as much as when I do it."

With that they were off. Amelia did her best to stay close to Amy without getting stepped on as Amy meandered through the crowd, socializing with everyone in a language Amelia didn't understand, though she occasionally got hints of meaning.

Amelia was starting to get bored after a couple of hours of this, when suddenly a great hush fell over the crowd. The spirit dragon appeared overhead, and all the dragons bowed down before her. Amelia felt a sharp jab from Amy, and she too knelt down.

She felt the spirit dragon's power surge through her, and she heard the dragon's words inside her mind, "Behold. This is Krystal, the new Dragon Queen. Obey her as you would me." She heard a roar, looked up, and saw a medium-sized blue dragon on the far side of the field.

The dragons stood up and resumed socializing. "That's it?" Amelia asked. "That's it. Dragon's aren't predisposed to pomp, you know."

"Well, can I see her? I want to know what happened.. how she ended up being a dragon.. what happened to the others?" Amelia asked.

"Hmm.. I suppose it can't hurt, pet. Besides I need to meet the Queen give my respects."
11212112211.title: At the Coronation

choices: Amy hasn't noticed she's lost Amelia yet.
112121122112.content:
Amelia followed Amy through the crowd toward Krystal, and they were about halfway there when an enormous black leg suddenly descended and blocked her path. She looked up, startled, and saw the black dragon she had seen from a distance earlier. He was easily the largest dragon here, three times the size of Amy, a good sixty feet from snout to tail. His black scales shimmered in the sunlight, and his underbelly and wings were a dark crimson, the same as his huge, pupil-less eyes. Twin wisps of smoke trailed from his snout.

She heard the black dragon speak. "Hello, little one."

Amelia did a double take as she realized the dragon's mouth wasn't moving. "Yes, I communicate telepathically. My name is Vermithrax, the oldest and greatest of the dragons here. Don't be scared, I just wanted to talk to you. We waited forever outside the cave, but you never came out."

"Oh, you were with the others? What happened to them?" Amelia asked. She felt strangely lightheaded as she looked into his eyes, as if she could lose herself in those great crimson orbs.

"I ate them, something I can sense you have experience with. Would you like to join them? I can offer you so much more than that... hatchling... you are with now," he thought to her with obvious disdain for Amy. He blew a little smoke over her, and she was surprised to find it smelled sweet and quite pleasant, not at all like the vaguely acrid oder of Amy's breath.

Amelia was doubtful, but was quickly falling under the dragon's spell. "Well.. I don't know. I'm supposed to be with Amy right now actually, she'd be so upset if I ended up eaten by another dragon."
112121122112.title: Interruptions

1121211221121.content:
Amelia stood there a moment, enthralled by the black dragon before her. She could feel her will being subverted but was powerless to do anything about it. But, just as suddenly as the dragon had entranced her, it ended when Amy returned and pinned Amelia to the ground under one of her foreclaws. Amy exhaled her own breath over Amelia, and she hacked and coughed as the sulfurous odor burned her lungs.

"That will be enough of THAT, this one is mine!" Amy hissed at Vermithrax. "Aren't ten thousand souls enough for you?" the red dragoness added.

"11,374 to be exact. They all reside in me, and I never forget any of them. I give them a great blessing, you know." Vermithrax said to Amy, vocalizing it this time.

Amy was undeterred. "It doesn't matter. This one is mine - I claimed her, you can find others to satisfy your hunger."

"Very well then." Vermithrax turned and walked off into the crowd. Amy let Amelia up when he was gone, and admonished her, "That was Vermithrax, the Soul-Eater. He'll devour your very soul, just like he has with every other human for a day's flight. You should have stayed close to me, it is very dangerous for you to be amongst other dragons."

"I'm sorry..." Amelia said. "Thanks for saving me."

Amy seemed to smile at Amelia. "It's alright, my pet. Someday you will be more than just a dragon's pet, but for now, I think it's best if I carried you the rest of the day."

Amy lowered her head to ground and opened her mouth. Amelia obediently climbed in, and Amy closed her mouth and coiled her tongue affectionately around her pet as she raised Amelia off the ground. Amy tilted her head back, giving the other dragons a good show as she swallowed, Amelia once again pushed herself into the dragon's throat as Amy swallowed. She rode the dragon's tight but comfortable throat down to the stomach, and relaxed in the tingling stomach bath as darkness took her.
1121211221121.title: More interruptions.

choices: Amelia puts her spirit in a real dragon egg.
11212112211211.content:
Amelia woke again the next morning, and once again broke out of her egg. She noticed the shells were starting to make quite a mess in the nest, she would have to clean that up. Amy was lying down, coiled around the nest. She raised her head and looked at Amelia when she heard the noise of her pet hatching.

"I'm sorry, pet. I shouldn't have taken you to a dragon gathering quite so soon. For now, just try and get settled in," Amy said to her.

And settle in she did. As the days passed Amelia cleaned up, and even decorated the nest a bit. Amy taught her all about the Dragon Kingdom, as the place she was in was called. It existed at a nexus between two worlds, a world of magic and fantasy, at which the Kingdom was at the end of a long peninsula, and the world of humans, in which the Kingdom formed a small island that phased in and out of existance at various places around the globe.

Amy taught Amelia the language of the dragons. In that language, her name was really Amee'xa, and as time wore on Amelia grew to be able to speak the language almost as good as a real dragon. Amy was only fifty years old, quite young for a dragon, barely into puberty.

Amy was true to her word though. Every day she ate Amelia, and every morning she was reborn from the dragon's magic, whole and healthy, no matter what had happened the previous day. Even when she broke her neck, and when she eaten by a giant snake, Amelia ate her corpse, or the snake, and she was perfectly healthy the next day. And as the years wore on she never aged either.

Amelia learned there were certain herbs and roots that grew around the island that the dragons had a liking for. Amy was delighted when Amelia began to use them as spices, carefully rubbing them into her hair and skin, and even bathing with them, or smoking herself with them. As her taste improved, their daily ritual became longer and more involved. Some days Amy licked Amelia all over, savoring her fantastic taste, before finally swallowing her down, something Amelia enjoyed immensely. Other days they would engage in mock-hunts, with Amelia tearing all over the nest, with Amy blowing little wisps of fire around her ankles before finally greedily wolfing Amelia down. If the winters became too cold for Amelia, Amy would gently eat her every day as soon as she hatched until it was warmer.

Through it all though, Amy never bit down. She didn't want her pet to suffer. As Amelia grew more confident Amy would allow her to venture further from the nest.

And so one day, after many years had passed, Amelia was steeping herself in a bath of sweetroot juice. It had taken her a month to gather enough roots to fill the crude tub she had created for herself, and she hoped Amy would appreciate her efforts. Amy had been gone most of the day, and Amelia knew she should be returning soon.

Sure enough, a few minutes later Amelia heard the familiar wing beats, and the soft 'twump' as her master landed. Amy looked at Amelia, who was busy working the sticky substance into her hair.

"What are you making tonight, my pet?" Amy asked.

"Dessert. I hope you like it." Amelia said, grinning. "Tonight is our ten-thousandth you know. I wanted to make it special."

Amy grinned back her pet. "Yes, indeed it is. I had something special planned myself. But first let's see how dessert tastes."

Amy grasped Amelia in a foreclaw and lifted her out of her bath, and gave her a long, slow lick on the sole of her left foot. "Mmm! Delicious! I think it needs some juice though." With that she lifted Amelia and put her back in the back in the sticky bath.

Amelia giggled when Amy began to probe her womanhood with her tongue. Juice, indeed! She lifted her left, then right legs and thrust them on either side of her master's tongue, giving Amy a nice dose of sweetroot as her juices began to dribble, and then flow freely onto Amy's tongue and mixing with the sweet, sticky juice in the tub. She moaned, softly at first, and then louder and faster as her master pleasured her. At her moment of climax, Amy scooped her up in her jaws, along with a healthy portion of the sweetroot juice, and wrapped her tongue around her orgasming pet, savoring the flavor for a good few minutes while Amelia caught her breath.

Finally, the day ended for Amelia as had all the others, with Amy tilting her head back, her powerful throat muscles taking her pet in, and giving her a wonderfully smooth, tight ride down to her stomach, separating her life-force from her body, allowing it be born anew the next day.

But tonight was their ten-thousandth. Almost thirty years. And Amelia had been such a wonderful pet. Tonight would be different, tonight Amee'xa had different plans for her pet.
11212112211211.title: Fast Forward

112121122112112.content: She was proud of her and decided, tonight is the night, and so she deposited her spirit into a real dragon egg. The next day, Amelia hatched the next day. She felt a little different and asked her Amy what she had done. Amy recounted the events and Amelia felt grand and thanked her master greatly. She wondered what would happen next. Amy announced to her "You will not be my pet any more, but one of my offspring." Amelia was shocked at that answer. She wondered how the others fared. She missed them so. Amy felt her trouble and asked, what bothers you Amelia?" She also got shocked at that. For its one of the rare times she had called her by her real name. She finally responded "I sometimes wish I could visit my friends..." Amy responded "If you want we could track them down." Amelia said "You would really do that for me?" Amy responded to that question "Of course, its the least I could do since you have been good to me for nearly thirty years. Should we set of soon?"
112121122112112.title: Amelia... Amy's offspring...

Amy let amelia on her back and they set off. Who should we track down first? Amelia said "let's see kystal she might have seen the others sometime" off the the queens cave it is then. The flight took about 15 minutes at incrediable speed but when you were there you were confronted by a guard dragon. "halt in the name of the queen" you two stopes and landed "what bussness do you have here?" the guard asked. Amy told him about amelia and her relation with kystal. The guard said wait here so they waited by the cave entrence. A little while later a bright blue dragon about the same size as amy came out "where is amelia then guard?" Amelia said "kystal is that you?" the queen looked over and smiled "1 seccond"she said and a swirling light of blue suronded her and when it stopped kystal was standing there. Amelia said "w-what I mean how did you do that?" kystal smiled and said a perk of being queen,long time no see" Amelia jumped of amy and ran at her and hugged her. "I can't believe it you became the queen" kystal said "I can't believed you haven't aged." amelia said "oh that's thanks to amy" "come on in I have to talk to you"

As they went in kystal called "Buddy we have guests 1dragon and 1 human" amelia said "who's buddy" kystal said "he's a small dragon I found running and crying a bit 30 years ago".
